author: CBC News
title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 23, 2020
description: After weeks of relatively steady growth in the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 in B.C., Wednesday saw a sudden spike.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • Provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie will give her daily update at 3 p.m. PT
  • 1,795 cases of COVID-19 have been confirmed in B.C.
  • 90 people have died of infection with the novel coronavirus.
